Package eu.amidst.core.inference

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    InferenceAlgorithm
    This interface handles and defines the algorithm used to run inference in BayesianNetwork models.
    PointEstimator
    This interface handles a Bayesian posterior point-estimator in a BayesianNetwork.
    Sampler
    This interface defines a sampling model.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ImportanceSampling
    This class implements the interface InferenceAlgorithm and defines the Importance Sampling algorithm.
    ImportanceSamplingRobust
    This class implements the interface InferenceAlgorithm and defines the Importance Sampling algorithm.
    InferenceEngine
    This class defines the Inference Engine for Bayesian Network models.
    MAPInference
    This class implements the interface PointEstimator and defines the MAP Inference algorithm.
    MPEInference
    This class implements the interface InferenceAlgorithm and makes MPE (Most Probable Explanation) Inference.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MAPInference.SearchAlgorithm  
    MPEInference.SearchAlgorithm
